u.user_id AS userId, u.email AS email, u.status AS status, u.created_at AS createdAt, u.withdrawn_at AS withdrawnAt,
ui.provider AS provider,
up.name AS name, up.first_name AS firstName, up.last_name AS lastName, up.passport_no AS passportNo, up.gender AS gender, up.country AS country
FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_identity ui ON ui.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN user_profile up ON up.user_id = u.user_id
